survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Meal Kit Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding meal kit delivery services, including factors that influence their choices and overall experience.

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit delivery services have you used in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit delivery services have you used in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: How often do you typically order meal kits per month?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for simplicity.

script.question_text: How often do you typically order meal kits per month?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use meal kit delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use meal kit delivery services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your preferred meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your preferred meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How important is the price of meal kits in your decision to continue using the service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to gauge importance.

script.question_text: How important is the price of meal kits in your decision to continue using the service?

questions.question_text: What additional features would encourage you to use a meal kit delivery service more frequently?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What additional features would encourage you to use a meal kit delivery service more frequently?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for quality assessment.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred meal kit service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred meal kit service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using meal kit delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using meal kit delivery services?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or feedback about your experience with meal kit delivery services.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or feedback about your experience with meal kit delivery services.
